pullrequest.title: Fix seeking back in time in log playback

content.raw:
This didn't work, should it?

1. Load `log_record_dbl_pendulum.sdf` (which records by default)
1. Delete the pendulum
1. Close the simulator - log file is saved to `/tmp/log`
1. Playback the logged file, i.e. `ign gazebo -p /tmp/log`
1. Wait for the pendulum to disappear
1. If I rewind, the pendulum shows up: `ign service -s /world/default/playback/control --reqtype ignition.msgs.LogPlaybackControl --reptype ignition.msgs.Boolean --timeout 5000 --req "rewind: true, pause: false"`
1. But if I seek to a time before the pendulum was deleted, but not exactly the beginning of simulation, the pendulum doesn't show up. For example: `ign service -s /world/default/playback/control --reqtype ignition.msgs.LogPlaybackControl --reptype ignition.msgs.Boolean --timeout 5000 --req "seek: {sec: 10}, pause: false"`
content.html:
This didn't work, should it?

  1. Load log_record_dbl_pendulum.sdf (which records by default)
  2. Delete the pendulum
  3. Close the simulator - log file is saved to /tmp/log
  4. Playback the logged file, i.e. ign gazebo -p /tmp/log
  5. Wait for the pendulum to disappear
  6. If I rewind, the pendulum shows up: ign service -s /world/default/playback/control --reqtype ignition.msgs.LogPlaybackControl --reptype ignition.msgs.Boolean --timeout 5000 --req "rewind: true, pause: false"
  7. But if I seek to a time before the pendulum was deleted, but not exactly the beginning of simulation, the pendulum doesn't show up. For example: ign service -s /world/default/playback/control --reqtype ignition.msgs.LogPlaybackControl --reptype ignition.msgs.Boolean --timeout 5000 --req "seek: {sec: 10}, pause: false"

pullrequest.title: Fix seeking back in time in log playback

content.raw: hmm I just tested this but couldn’t reproduce the problem. Here’s my [state.tlog](https://www.dropbox.com/s/yi7z2bbd7xr2ggy/state.tlog?dl=0). I launched gazebo and played for ~10s until the double pendulum disappears, and seek to 1s - the model popped back. I also tried rewind, play till 10s, then seek to 7s but the outcome is still correct. Am I missing a step?
content.html: hmm I just tested this but couldn’t reproduce the problem. Here’s my state.tlog. I launched gazebo and played for ~10s until the double pendulum disappears, and seek to 1s - the model popped back. I also tried rewind, play till 10s, then seek to 7s but the outcome is still correct. Am I missing a step?

content.raw: Humm I can't reproduce the issue anymore. Sorry for the noise. This works for me!
